title: A critical review of hydrogen storage: toward the nanoconfinement of complex hydrides from the synthesis and characterization perspectives
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00353E, Review Article
Amanuel Gidey Gebretatios, Fawzi Banat, Chin Kui Cheng
Nanoconfining hydrides in a suitable host material using an appropriate preparation method is a promising approach to enhance their hydrogen storage properties, including kinetics, thermodynamics, and reversibility.
